TopicTitle: Why is that my shuttle doesnt show up on the orbit map

Articles.Content:
I put a mining vehicle to a high orbit.

I can control it...But it never shows up in the orbit map.

And I cant find it from the radar station;.;

Go top of the screen to bring up a list of small icons. Make sure all of them are on by clicking on all the gray icons. If it's still not there, it's a separate issue.

btw, if you can't click those in flight, close the NavBall and bring it up again, then try click again.

I have the same issue most of the time. I think it's a bug.

btw, if you can't click those in flight, close the NavBall and bring it up again, then try click again.

Will try this next time.

If this doesn't help:

Go back to the space center, bring up the tracking station and activate the buttons from here. This works every time for me (although it is quite annoying).
If you still have problems, check the icon that is labeled "debris". I've had ships accidentally get labelled debris.
